description.english: What is undead may, in fact, die.
Receive Bakhan's gratitude.
One's free ride is another's free lunch.
Move like a butterfly, strike like a tiger.
Reach the final frontier.
It's not theft if the gods willed it so.
Purchase a ship.
Your boots are made for walking, so that's just what they'll do.

displayName.english: Death Is Just a Flesh Wound

description.english: Make the deal of a lifetime.
Your success will mirror your faith.
The gods always pay their debts.
When sulfur fumigation just won't suffice.
Gain 5,000 Shards.
Complete 10 quests.
Bring Kaschuf what he lacks.
Discover a hidden fortune against all odds.
Become an initiate of the gods.

displayName.english: Home Is Where You Hang Your Armour

description.english: Get yourself a place to call home.
Obtain a "magic" spear.
Rescue a damsel in distress.
A warrior's best teacher is experience.
Awaken the sleepers and put the sleepless to rest.
Change your face and be invisible; walk among men without being seen.
Enjoy the hospitality of the Azure Prince.
Discover the secret of the Mannekyn people.
This little piggy went to market.
Reach Rank 10.
Knowledge is its own reward, but why stop there?
You're gonna need a bigger boat.
There's more to things old and forgotten than meets the eye.
Give in to a mermaid's temptation...
Discover a shopper's paradise.
Put an end to a rebel alliance.
Help the Northern Alliance to overtake an enemy stronghold.
These are not rookie numbers. Reach 2000 Shards in Guild investments.
Good performers copy; great performers steal.
Treat yourself to a royal hoard.
A great tool is no substitute for true skill, but it certainly helps. Equip best in slot armour and ability items.
Conjure success out of dust.
Inheriting blood does not beget power; spilling it does.
Because "rock, paper, scissors" is so pedestrian.
Rock out and bring down the house!
Experience builds character! Reach Rank 10 in Ironman mode.
There's no greater achievement in afterlife.
A mighty aegis to keep even Nagil himself away.
You've heard of risk-reward analysis, but you tend to forget the risk part.
You can sniff out knowledge in the unlikeliest places.
Sometimes even death can't guarantee a good night's sleep.
Gotta spill some to earn some.

displayName.english: Am I A Joke To You?

description.english: A swordsman, a mermaid and a beetle walk into a wizard's lab...
Receive the wisdom of a subaqueous Dom.
Killing and pillaging is a monster's nature. What's your excuse?
No one can accuse you of being spineless.
The Knight, in the Castle, with the Long Knife.
You should be so lucky.
An eye for an eye makes the last man standing a king.
You home is your castle. And vice versa.
The more you sweat in enchanting, the less you bleed in battle.
Do you speak thieves' cant or thieves' can?
... said the spider to the fly.
A sword by any other name would strike as swift.
Life finds a way.
Never let mundane truth get in the way of good fiction.
Only the most elating trills are worthy of royal ears.
What's one more mask to wear for a courtier?
Snitches get stitches only if they're caught.
Bondage can bring release.
(Don't Fear) The Ripper
This is the way glory starts, not with a shout but with a whisper.
At some point you need to address the elephant in the steppes.
Live and let live again.
In this issue: What does your sword say about your personality?
Avar hoardeth, thou takest away.
More than once in woodlands dreary…
It's Like Looking In A Mirror Only… Not.
Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
No fury like a Chancellor scorned.
What's in a name? Sometimes - a self-fulfilling prophecy.
When you are thick-skinned enough, you can ignore even the will of the gods.
Seclusion connects with all creation.
… but sometimes you can render unto Caesar instead.
Power corrupts; ultimate power corrupts absolutely.
Low supply, high demands.
One small step for you, one giant stain on the floor.
There's more to this than meets the eye.
Sometimes young love just needs a little push.
Troubadours always have it easy.
Float like a butterfly, sting like a wasp.
Defy the rules of the gods and gain Rank 12 with maxed out abilities (base 12 in every ability)!
This belongs in a museum.
You laid to rest a king's concerns.
Dead men tell no tales... unless you're one of their own.
No one lasts forever.
The lords of the deepest fathoms can grant your deepest desires.
It's curtains for this midnight prowler.
Ain't no moonshine when he's gone.
Avoiding faux pas is all you need to unveil the mysteries of pas de deux.
You weren't looking for anything, so you found everything.
Travel the world, visit new places, meet interesting creatures. Kill 100 different enemy types.
You are a scourge upon the Violet Ocean.
Flip the script on someone who doesn't take ‘No’ for an answer.
Even anarchic structures can benefit from managerial makeover.
‘Don't you dare close your eyes’
You had the last laugh.
This tragedy could make the desert weep.
The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.
The highest highs lead to the lowest lows.
You have one shot, one opportunity to seize everything you ever wanted.
You wiped the slate clean with a most persistent foe.
Lack of faith is evidenced by admission.
Rectify a great injustice, perpetuated for decades.
No secret shall remain unveiled.
This musician won't be giving an encore.
You don't need wings to take a flight of fancy.
To your health!
The hunter has become the hunted.
Woe to the shepherd, who abandons the flock.
Or does it?
You made an unusual delivery.
Stay awhile and have them listen.
The wrongs of the past call for rites in the present.
Wherein lies the remedy to lies?
Spoiler: It was not the butler.
